mapper.insert: INSERT INTO device ( device_no, device_name, pricing_standard_id, status, created_by ) VALUES ( #{deviceNo}, #{deviceName}, #{pricingStandardId}, #{status}, #{createdBy} )
mapper.update: UPDATE device SET device_no = #{deviceNo}, device_name = #{deviceName}, pricing_standard_id = #{pricingStandardId}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, device_no as deviceNo, device_name as deviceName, pricing_standard_id as pricingStandardId, status, created_by as createdBy, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM device WHERE id = #{id}
